title: Reconnect
body:
Reconnect button is NOT WORKING!
I got disconnected from a ranked game.

And i couldnt reconnect to it, tried restarting my pc.
NOTHING, my friend was still inside the game.
https://i.gyazo.com/644dbd654548281ebdf91a018df760fb.png

replies.body: this exact same thing happens to me when i use the new client, but when i use the old client, everything is hunky dory. talked to riot parrysuper and we cannot figure out the issue, good luck. any news hit me up and let me know what you did to fix it

This is the first I've heard about the reconnect button isn't working, but the updated client is also in testing.  It could have had issues, but network issues could also cause unresponsiveness to reconnecting with our game server.  If this happens again, try and use the legacy client to rule out possibilities:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I also suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide if these disconnections continue to find and tackle whatever is causing it.  Let me know if you have any questions!
